body: i thought monorino left the game entirely

yo some gems in dis one

This month is a banger. Mizuryu kei kept on updating gts then we'll have a whole book of it. My fav artist, jairou, mizuryu doing its job well. 

Minorino updates too. I wonder if he'll be gone again, if not then it'll be a new book for this year. Gotta get em bag
